Breadth-First.Explanation: Broad descriptive observation of environment without a specific hypothesis, collecting general clues
Listing multiple location possibilities based on vegetation and style, still shallow exploration

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused on building details to verify region hypotheses
Used cropped facade images and structural details for targeted reverse image search
Ran a targeted search for a named building match in Munich
Cross-referenced building features against maps and photos to confirm identity
Final verification by matching park and building context with original image
Confirmed setting by integrating architectural features with park layout
Re-examined and pinned down exact street (Adalbertstraße) via image comparisons
Summarized and reinforced confirmation through cross-referenced evidence
Presented the definitive location as the final output

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Transitioned from broad hypothesis generation to focused verification of a specific building clue
